mapper.insert: insert into memberPromotion(id, createTime, lastModifiedTime, beginTime, endTime, requiredLevel, discountFraction, tokenAmount) values(#{id}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifiedTime}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, #{requiredLevel}, #{discountFraction}, #{tokenAmount})
mapper.update: update memberPromotion set lastModifiedTime=#{lastModifiedTime}, beginTime=#{beginTime}, endTime=#{endTime}, requiredLevel=#{requiredLevel}, discountFraction=#{discountFraction}, tokenAmount=#{tokenAmount} where id=#{id} and createTime=#{createTime}
mapper.delete: delete from memberPromotion where id=#{id} and createTime=#{createTime}
mapper.select: select * from memberPromotion where beginTime <= #{begin} and endTime >= #{end}
